description: This course examines the way in which cross-border commercial disputes are resolved. In doing so, the course will examine international conventions, selected national legislation and case law that address international commercial problems involving jurisdiction, recognition and enforcement of judgments, and choice of law.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24), MICLaw
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
